rules_text:
When Jahan, the Third Shah enters, shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw three cards.
Monument {3}{U}{U} [i](You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its monument cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2:
You may look at the top card of your library.
{T}: You may play the top card of your library.
